mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( notice_id, notice_title, notice_datetime, notice_content, notice_views, member_id ) VALUES ( seq_notice_id.nextval, #{noticeTitle}, sysdate, #{noticeContent}, 0, #{memberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id FROM NOTICE WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY notice_datetime DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_datetime, notice_content, notice_views, member_id FROM NOTICE WHERE notice_id = #{boardNum}

SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_datetime, notice_content, notice_views, member_id FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, notice_id, notice_title, notice_datetime, notice_content, notice_views, member_id FROM (SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_datetime, notice_content, notice_views, member_id FROM NOTICE ORDER BY notice_id DESC) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
